| HistoryText             = The X-Brotherhood were at their school when [[Loki Laufeyson (Ikol) (Earth-616)|Loki]] came there in need of a telepath. Seeing a short blonde man in front of him, he realized this was a amalgamation of [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] and [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]].{{r|Infinity Wars Vol 1 3}}

After a long talk and killing a piece of [[Devondra (Earth-616)|Devondra]], Diamond Patch sent his future self a telepathic message in a bottle, resulting in the [[Phoenix Force (Earth-14412)|Phoenix]]-empowered [[James Howlett (Earth-14412)|Wolverine]] from [[Earth-14412|The End of Time]] arriving to help Loki and Diamond Patch. He handed over the [[Power Stone]] and split Diamond Patch back into Logan and Emma Frost before leaving.{{r|Infinity Wars Vol 1 4}}
